00023 #ifndef UVM_ML_MACROS_H
00024 #define UVM_ML_MACROS_H
00025 #define MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(o)
00026 
00027 #define SC_MAX_TIME sc_time(~sc_dt::UINT64_ZERO, false) 
00028 
00029 #define RESET_PROC_EXTERN(proc)
00030 #define SET_PROC_EXTERN(proc)
00031 
00032 #define CHECK_STOP_AT_PHASE_END() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->check_stop()
00033 
00034 #define NODE_CONSTRUCTION_DONE(pmod) \
00035     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00036     if (comp) \
00037         comp->build_phase(this); \
00038     sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_module_construction_done(pmod); 
00039 
00040 #define QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_CONSTRUCTION() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_end_of_construction();
00041 
00042 #define NODE_CONNECT(pmod) { uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); if (comp) comp->connect_phase(this); }
00043 
00044 #define QUASI_STATIC_COMPLETE_BINDING() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_complete_binding()
00045 
00046 #define NODE_END_OF_ELABORATION(pmod) \
00047     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00048     if (comp) \
00049         comp->end_of_elaboration_phase(this); \
00050     else  \
00051         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_module_end_of_elaboration(pmod); 
00052 
00053 #define QUASI_STATIC_END_OF_ELABORATION() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_end_of_elaboration();
00054 
00055 #define NODE_START_OF_SIMULATION(pmod) \
00056     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(pmod); \
00057     if (comp) \
00058         comp->start_of_simulation_phase(this); \
00059     else \
00060         sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_module_start_of_simulation(pmod);
00061 
00062 #define QUASI_STATIC_START_OF_SIMULATION() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_start_of_simulation();
00063 
00064 #define QUASI_STATIC_PREPARE_TO_SIMULATE() sc_get_curr_simcontext()->quasi_static_prepare_to_simulate();
00065 
00066 #define UVM_SC_CO_SIMULATE(duration) sc_get_curr_simcontext()->co_simulate((duration))
00067 
00068 #endif
